title: Buy
description:
Puhas is a one stop for all your needs for fresh food and nutrition. We offer the best and freshest produce sourced from our farms directly. We promise the best value for your money and reduce the hassle of finding the cleanest nutrition for your family.

Puhas is Jharkhand's growing online supermarket shopping app, trusted by many happy customers and counting! Shop anytime, anywhere from a range of  categories that guarantees all the alphabet letters of Vitamins and including farm-fresh fruits and vegetables, groceries. Enjoy hassle-free online grocery shopping and contactless home delivery at just a click of a button.
